data.text2:
Before reaching back for radiological consultation, you call the BE Office to send additional support to the ECP. You also send one BE Tech to the hospital to conduct interviews and assist with other activities related to the possible exposure to the damage assessment team and first responders.

You have remaining team members conduct research about the health effects of the isotopes included on the RAM Permit, given that there is an unknown item that was not included on the inventory.
data.text3:
Major Fletcher agreed with your recommendation to contact the ESOH Service Center to get guidance from the Radiation Health Branch or AFRAT.

Before he contacts the ESOH Service Center, he calls the BE Office to send additional support to the ECP. He also sends one BE Tech to the hospital to conduct interviews and assist with other activities related to the possible exposure to the damage assessment team and first responders.

He has remaining team members conduct research about the health effects of the isotopes included on the RAM Permit, given that there is an unknown item that was not included on the inventory.
